title: "Will artificial intelligence worsen inequality and make the world less friendly? On data quality, discrimination and (possible?) solutions."
excerpt: "Here we come to the issue of using artificial intelligence (however we define it), which learns from data (from various sources). Seemingly irrelevant \"information\" in large amounts can have the effect of making a particular model \"skewed\" so that the result of its operation is simply discriminatory."
